title: Shakespeare's Macbeth | 40 Minutes on Single Paragraph
description:
An analysis of one paragraph of Macbeth. The philosophy of Macbeth and its meaning. I thought I would discuss a single paragraph of Shakespeare's Macbeth in this video. I will be doing more videos like this in the future. Read Macbeth if you have not; it is absolutely fascinating.

Check out my podcast: Finding Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Pintrest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
